charaepi_ch0123_90_mizuki/2301_1101_0100:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] saw
Selene listening intently to N and Hilbert.
charaepi_ch0123_90_mizuki/2301_1201_0300:
I was just asking these two what they
thought about Necrozma!
charaepi_ch0123_90_mizuki/2301_1201_0400:
People say that this form of Necrozma
forcibly latched onto Lunala.
charaepi_ch0123_90_mizuki/2301_1201_0500:
So, I was kinda worried that they might be
hurting because of that.
charaepi_ch0123_90_mizuki/2301_1201_0600:
Neither of the Pokémon are saying that
they’re distressed, though.
charaepi_ch0123_90_mizuki/2301_1201_0700:
They’re both in agreement that they’re
supporting each other.
charaepi_ch0123_90_mizuki/2301_1201_0800:
If N says so, then I guess there’s nothing to
worry about!
charaepi_ch0123_90_mizuki/2301_1201_0900:
Thank goodness! I’m so glad I asked you
two for advice!
charaepi_ch0123_90_mizuki/2301_1201_1000:
If they really were hurting in any way from
their fusion...
charaepi_ch0123_90_mizuki/2301_1201_1100:
I was thinking of separating them with a
machine I got from Colress, but I guess
they’re OK!
charaepi_ch0123_90_mizuki/2301_1201_1200:
You had your Pokémon’s best interest in
mind.
charaepi_ch0123_90_mizuki/2301_1201_1300:
Perhaps at first, their relationship really was
one-sided, like you imagined...
charaepi_ch0123_90_mizuki/2301_1201_1400: but I think relationships are always changing.
charaepi_ch0123_90_mizuki/2301_1201_1500:
Maybe the days they’ve spent together
helped them open up to each other and
deepened their bond, little by little.
charaepi_ch0123_90_mizuki/2301_1201_1600:
I guess the relationship between Pokémon
that’ve fused is kind of like that of a
sync pair, huh?
charaepi_ch0123_90_mizuki/2301_1201_1700:
I suppose you could put it that way. And
of course...
charaepi_ch0123_90_mizuki/2301_1201_1800:
I’m sure forming a sync pair with Selene
was a positive influence on them, too.
charaepi_ch0123_90_mizuki/2301_1201_2000:
I wonder if we can become even better
friends—to the point where I can understand
what it’s saying, too!
charaepi_ch0123_90_mizuki/2301_0302_2300: I think you’re good friends already!
charaepi_ch0123_90_mizuki/2301_0402_2400:
Indeed. And it’s OK not to think about it
too hard.
charaepi_ch0123_90_mizuki/2301_0402_2500:
As long as you keep trying to understand
your partner, I’m sure you’ll be fine.
charaepi_ch0123_90_mizuki/2301_1201_2700:
I want us to shine even brighter as a
sync pair...
charaepi_ch0123_90_mizuki/2301_1201_2800:
so Necrozma and I will keep on battling
together at full power!
